document.full_text: a california man said atlanta's pitching coach, roger mcdowell, spewed homophobic comments and threatened to knock out his teeth with a bat before the braves played the san francisco giants over the weekend.
document.title: roundup: mcdowell apologizes after fan's accusation
lines_and_colors: a california man said atlanta's pitching coach, roger mcdowell, spewed homophobic comments and threatened to knock out his teeth with a bat before the braves played the san francisco giants over the weekend.
